mapper.select: SELECT A.REQ_ID, A.REQ_TITLE, A.REQ_CON, A.SYS_INFO_NM, A.REQ_TYPE, A.REQ_DTTM, A.REQ_END_DTTM, B.CLEAR_ST_DTTM, B.CLEAR_DUE_DTTM FROM SR_REQ A,SR_CLEAR B WHERE A.REQ_ID = B.REQ_ID AND B.CLEAR_CON IS NOT NULL AND B.CLEAR_NOW != "CLEAR" AND B.USER_ID = #{user}

SELECT A.REQ_ID, A.REQ_TITLE, A.REQ_CON, A.SYS_INFO_NM, A.REQ_TYPE, A.REQ_DTTM, A.REQ_END_DTTM, B.CLEAR_ST_DTTM, B.CLEAR_DUE_DTTM FROM SR_REQ A,SR_CLEAR B WHERE A.REQ_ID = B.REQ_ID AND B.CLEAR_CON IS NULL AND B.USER_ID = #{user}

SELECT A.REQ_ID, A.REQ_TITLE, A.SYS_INFO_NM, A.REQ_TYPE, B.ORG_CODE, A.REQ_NM, A.REQ_CON, C.CLEAR_CON, D.RESULT_REG_DTTM, A.REQ_DTTM, A.REQ_END_DTTM FROM SR_REQ A,REQ_INFO B,SR_CLEAR C,SR_RESULT D WHERE A.REQ_NO = B.REQ_NO AND A.REQ_ID = C.REQ_ID AND C.CLEAR_ID = D.CLEAR_ID

SELECT A.REQ_ID, B.ORG_CODE, A.REQ_TITLE, A.SYS_INFO_NM, A.REQ_TYPE, A.REQ_NM, A.REQ_CON, C.CLEAR_CON, A.REQ_DTTM, A.REQ_END_DTTM, D.RESULT_REG_DTTM FROM SR_REQ A,REQ_INFO B,SR_CLEAR C,SR_RESULT D WHERE A.REQ_NO = B.REQ_NO AND A.REQ_ID = C.REQ_ID AND C.CLEAR_ID = D.CLEAR_ID AND A.REQ_DTTM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchYtype},#{searchMtype},'%')

SELECT A.REQ_TITLE, A.SYS_INFO_NM, A.REQ_TYPE, A.REQ_DTTM, A.REQ_END_DTTM, B.RESULT_REG_DTTM FROM SR_REQ A,SR_RESULT B,SR_CLEAR C WHERE A.REQ_ID = C.REQ_ID AND C.CLEAR_ID = B.CLEAR_ID AND A.REQ_DTTM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchYtype},#{searchMtype},'%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SR_CLEAR WHERE CLEAR_NOW != "CLEAR"
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SR_CLEAR WHERE CLEAR_NOW = "CLEAR"
